code: export var editProfileValidators={userName:{required:function required(value){return value==="";},minLength:function minLength(value){return value.length<2;},maxLength:function maxLength(value){return value.length>40;}},profileDescription:{required:function required(value){return value==="";},minLength:function minLength(value){return value.length<2;},maxLength:function maxLength(value){return value.length>200;}}};
